prompts.title: AI-Powered Personal Brand Architecture
prompts.prompt_text: Design a comprehensive personal brand architecture for [PROFESSIONAL_ROLE] looking to establish thought leadership in [INDUSTRY]. Include: 1) Brand positioning statement and unique value proposition, 2) Content pillar strategy across platforms (LinkedIn, Twitter, YouTube, blog), 3) Visual identity guidelines, 4) Voice and tone documentation, 5) 90-day launch plan with weekly milestones, 6) Metrics and KPIs for brand growth, 7) Collaboration and partnership strategy, 8) Crisis management protocols. Create actionable templates for each component.

prompts.title: Hyper-Realistic Portrait Lighting Setup
prompts.prompt_text: Create a hyper-realistic portrait of [SUBJECT_DESCRIPTION] with professional studio lighting. Three-point lighting setup with key light at 45 degrees creating subtle Rembrandt triangle, fill light softening shadows, and hair light adding dimension. Catchlights visible in eyes. Shot on medium format digital camera, f/2.8, slight shallow depth of field. Skin texture visible but flattering, professional retouching style. Background: seamless gradient from dark to medium gray. Color grade: natural with slight warmth in highlights.

prompts.title: Enterprise SaaS Go-to-Market Strategy
prompts.prompt_text: Develop a comprehensive go-to-market strategy for an enterprise SaaS product targeting [TARGET_MARKET]. Include: 1) Market segmentation and ICP definition, 2) Competitive positioning matrix, 3) Pricing strategy with enterprise tiers, 4) Channel strategy (direct sales, partners, PLG), 5) Marketing funnel with CAC projections, 6) Sales playbook outline, 7) Customer success framework, 8) First-year revenue projections with assumptions. Provide detailed implementation timeline and resource requirements.

prompts.title: Cinematic Product Reveal Video
prompts.prompt_text: Create a 30-second cinematic product reveal video for [PRODUCT_TYPE]. Open with dramatic black, slowly revealing product silhouette with rim lighting. Camera slowly orbits product as key features illuminate sequentially. Include particle effects suggesting innovation/technology. Build tension with sound design, climax with full product reveal in hero lighting. End with logo animation and tagline. Style: Apple-inspired minimalism meets dramatic automotive commercial. Color grade: high contrast, deep blacks, crisp highlights.

prompts.title: Full-Stack TypeScript Microservices Architecture
prompts.prompt_text: Design a production-ready microservices architecture using TypeScript for [APPLICATION_TYPE]. Include: 1) Service decomposition strategy with bounded contexts, 2) API Gateway pattern implementation, 3) Event-driven communication with message queues, 4) Database-per-service pattern with data consistency strategies, 5) Authentication/authorization across services, 6) Observability setup (logging, tracing, metrics), 7) CI/CD pipeline configuration, 8) Kubernetes deployment manifests. Provide code structure templates and Docker Compose for local development.

prompts.title: Moody Atmospheric Landscape Photography
prompts.prompt_text: Create a moody atmospheric landscape photograph of [LOCATION_TYPE] during golden hour transitioning to blue hour. Low-hanging fog or mist creating layers of depth. Dramatic cloud formations catching last light. Foreground interest with [ELEMENT] leading eye into scene. Long exposure effect on any water elements creating silk-like texture. Shot on large format camera, hyperfocal distance for front-to-back sharpness. Color palette: warm oranges and magentas in sky transitioning to cool blues in shadows. Style reference: landscape masters like Ansel Adams meets contemporary color work.

prompts.title: Advanced SEO Content Cluster Strategy
prompts.prompt_text: Develop an advanced SEO content cluster strategy for [WEBSITE/BUSINESS] targeting [PRIMARY_KEYWORDS]. Include: 1) Pillar page architecture with 5 supporting cluster topics each, 2) Keyword mapping with search intent classification, 3) Internal linking strategy and URL structure, 4) Content brief templates for each content type, 5) Schema markup recommendations, 6) Featured snippet optimization tactics, 7) E-E-A-T signals integration plan, 8) 6-month content calendar with priority scoring. Include competitive gap analysis methodology.

prompts.title: Fantasy Character Design Sheet
prompts.prompt_text: Create a professional character design sheet for [CHARACTER_TYPE] in [FANTASY_SETTING]. Include: front view, 3/4 view, and back view in T-pose. Detail callouts for distinctive features, armor/clothing elements, and accessories. Expression studies showing 4-6 emotions. Color palette swatch. Height comparison with average human. Style: high fantasy illustration suitable for game development or animation. Clean linework with full color rendering. Background: neutral gray with subtle gradient. Include any cultural or faction-specific design elements.

prompts.title: React Native Mobile App Architecture
prompts.prompt_text: Design a scalable React Native mobile app architecture for [APP_TYPE] supporting iOS and Android. Include: 1) Project structure with feature-based organization, 2) State management solution (Redux Toolkit/Zustand/Jotai comparison), 3) Navigation architecture with deep linking, 4) API layer with offline-first capabilities, 5) Push notification integration, 6) Analytics and crash reporting setup, 7) Performance optimization strategies, 8) Testing strategy (unit, integration, E2E). Provide starter template code and CI/CD pipeline for app store deployment.

prompts.title: B2B Content Marketing Funnel
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive B2B content marketing funnel for [COMPANY_TYPE] targeting [BUYER_PERSONA]. Include: 1) TOFU content (blog posts, social content, videos) with topics, 2) MOFU content (whitepapers, webinars, case studies) with outlines, 3) BOFU content (demos, trials, ROI calculators) with specifications, 4) Email nurture sequences for each stage, 5) Lead scoring model, 6) Content repurposing strategy, 7) Distribution channel strategy, 8) Attribution model and KPIs. Provide 12-week implementation roadmap.

prompts.title: Architectural Visualization Interior
prompts.prompt_text: Create a photorealistic architectural visualization of a [ROOM_TYPE] interior in [DESIGN_STYLE] style. Natural lighting from floor-to-ceiling windows, supplemented by designer pendant fixtures. High-end materials: marble countertops, hardwood floors, custom millwork. Furniture layout demonstrating flow and function. Realistic fabric textures on upholstery. Plants adding life and color. Human scale reference items (books, accessories). Rendered quality: indistinguishable from professional real estate photography. Time: late afternoon with warm natural light.

prompts.title: Python Data Pipeline Framework
prompts.prompt_text: Design a robust Python data pipeline framework for [DATA_SOURCE] to [DATA_DESTINATION] processing [DATA_VOLUME]. Include: 1) Extraction layer with retry logic and rate limiting, 2) Transformation layer with pandas/polars optimization, 3) Loading layer with incremental updates, 4) Error handling and dead letter queues, 5) Monitoring and alerting, 6) Logging and audit trails, 7) Testing strategy with fixtures, 8) Scheduling with Airflow/Prefect DAG. Provide modular code structure with configuration management.

prompts.title: Brand Video Storytelling Script
prompts.prompt_text: Write a compelling 2-minute brand storytelling video script for [COMPANY/PRODUCT]. Structure: Hook (first 5 seconds to capture attention), Problem (relatable pain point), Journey (authentic founder/customer story), Solution (natural product integration), Transformation (emotional before/after), Call-to-Action. Include: shot list suggestions, B-roll recommendations, music/sound design notes, interview question prompts if featuring real people. Tone: authentic, emotionally resonant, avoiding corporate speak. Suitable for YouTube, LinkedIn, and website hero section.

prompts.title: Isometric City Block Illustration
prompts.prompt_text: Create a detailed isometric illustration of a vibrant city block featuring [THEME/DISTRICT_TYPE]. Include: multiple building types with varied architectural styles, street-level activity with diverse characters, vehicles and transportation, green spaces and street furniture, signage and wayfinding elements. Style: clean vector aesthetic with subtle gradients, limited color palette of 6-8 harmonious colors, consistent isometric angle throughout. Suitable for: website hero, app illustration, print materials. Include small easter eggs and narrative details rewarding close inspection.

prompts.title: Kubernetes Production Hardening Guide
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive Kubernetes production hardening guide for [WORKLOAD_TYPE]. Include: 1) RBAC configuration with least-privilege principles, 2) Network policies for pod-to-pod communication, 3) Pod security standards and policies, 4) Secrets management with external providers, 5) Resource quotas and limit ranges, 6) Ingress security with TLS, 7) Logging and audit policy, 8) Backup and disaster recovery procedures. Provide YAML manifests, helm chart configurations, and compliance checklist for SOC2/HIPAA.

prompts.title: Social Media Campaign Calendar
prompts.prompt_text: Design a comprehensive 30-day social media campaign calendar for [BRAND] launching [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include: 1) Daily content themes aligned with campaign phases, 2) Platform-specific content variations (Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, Twitter), 3) Posting times optimized by platform and audience, 4) Hashtag strategy and trending topic integration, 5) Influencer collaboration touchpoints, 6) Paid amplification recommendations, 7) Engagement response protocols, 8) Performance tracking metrics. Provide content briefs and visual direction for each post type.

prompts.title: Ethereal Double Exposure Portrait
prompts.prompt_text: Create an ethereal double exposure portrait combining [SUBJECT] with [NATURE_ELEMENT]. Primary exposure: profile or 3/4 portrait view with soft lighting. Secondary exposure: organic textures (forest, flowers, ocean, cosmos) seamlessly blended within silhouette. Color palette: harmonious and dreamlike, either moody cool tones or warm golden hues. High contrast between subject edges and blended interior. Artistic lens flare or light leak effects. Final style: fine art photography suitable for gallery print, emotional and evocative.

prompts.title: GraphQL API Design Best Practices
prompts.prompt_text: Design a production GraphQL API for [DOMAIN] following best practices. Include: 1) Schema design with proper types, inputs, and interfaces, 2) Query complexity and depth limiting, 3) Pagination patterns (cursor vs offset), 4) Error handling and union types for errors, 5) Authentication and field-level authorization, 6) DataLoader pattern for N+1 prevention, 7) Persisted queries for security, 8) Schema documentation and versioning. Provide schema SDL, resolver implementations, and testing strategies.

prompts.title: Product Launch Email Sequence
prompts.prompt_text: Create a high-converting product launch email sequence for [PRODUCT_TYPE]. Include: 1) Pre-launch teaser series (3 emails building anticipation), 2) Launch day announcement with urgency elements, 3) Feature spotlight series (3 emails highlighting key benefits), 4) Social proof email with testimonials/results, 5) FAQ/objection handling email, 6) Final call with scarcity, 7) Post-launch nurture for non-buyers. For each email: subject line variations, preview text, full copy, CTA buttons, and A/B test suggestions. Include send timing recommendations.

prompts.title: Vintage Film Photography Emulation
prompts.prompt_text: Create a photograph of [SCENE_DESCRIPTION] with authentic vintage film emulation. Film stock: [PORTRA 400/TRI-X/KODACHROME/VELVIA] characteristics. Include: accurate grain structure, color response curves, halation in highlights, subtle light leaks at frame edges, period-appropriate composition. If color: accurate skin tones and color cast of chosen stock. If B&W: tonal range and contrast matching film response. Slight vignetting and focus falloff. Style: indistinguishable from actual film scan. Subject matter and styling appropriate to film's era.

prompts.title: Startup Financial Modeling Framework
prompts.prompt_text: Build a comprehensive financial model for a [STAGE] [BUSINESS_MODEL] startup. Include: 1) Revenue model with cohort-based projections, 2) Cost structure (fixed, variable, semi-variable), 3) Unit economics (CAC, LTV, payback period), 4) Cash flow projections with runway analysis, 5) Scenario modeling (conservative, base, aggressive), 6) Key metrics dashboard (MRR, churn, NRR), 7) Fundraising implications and dilution modeling, 8) Sensitivity analysis on key assumptions. Provide Excel/Sheets template with formulas and documentation.

prompts.title: 3D Product Rendering Photorealistic
prompts.prompt_text: Create a photorealistic 3D product rendering of [PRODUCT_TYPE] for e-commerce use. Hero angle showing product best features. Studio lighting setup: main key light, fill light, and rim/accent light. Clean white or gradient background suitable for web. Accurate material rendering: metal reflections, glass refraction, fabric texture, plastic sheen as appropriate. Sharp focus with slight depth of field on edges. Shadow casting naturally on surface. Resolution: 4K suitable for zoom functionality. Style: premium brand aesthetic matching [BRAND_REFERENCE].

prompts.title: Next.js Enterprise Application Template
prompts.prompt_text: Create an enterprise-grade Next.js 14+ application template with App Router. Include: 1) Project structure for scalable feature development, 2) Authentication with NextAuth/Clerk integration, 3) Database layer with Prisma/Drizzle, 4) Type-safe API routes with tRPC or Server Actions, 5) State management with React Query/Zustand, 6) UI component library setup (shadcn/ui or similar), 7) Testing configuration (Jest, React Testing Library, Playwright), 8) CI/CD with GitHub Actions. Include environment configuration, error boundaries, and logging setup.

prompts.title: Editorial Portrait Series Concept
prompts.prompt_text: Create an editorial portrait of [SUBJECT_DESCRIPTION] for [PUBLICATION_STYLE] magazine. Concept: [THEME/MOOD]. Styling: contemporary high fashion or artistic interpretation. Lighting: dramatic editorial lighting with strong shadows and highlights. Background: contextual environment or studio setup supporting narrative. Expression: compelling and authentic, telling a story. Post-processing: editorial color grade, selective skin retouching maintaining texture. Composition: rule of thirds with intentional negative space for text overlay. Final output suitable for full-page spread.

prompts.title: Customer Journey Mapping Framework
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive customer journey map for [BUSINESS_TYPE] targeting [CUSTOMER_PERSONA]. Include: 1) Journey stages from awareness to advocacy, 2) Customer actions, thoughts, and emotions at each stage, 3) Touchpoints across all channels, 4) Pain points and moments of truth, 5) Opportunities for improvement, 6) Internal team responsibilities per touchpoint, 7) Metrics to measure each stage, 8) Priority initiatives for journey optimization. Provide visual journey map template and action plan for top 5 improvements.

prompts.title: Sci-Fi Environment Concept Art
prompts.prompt_text: Create concept art for a [SCI-FI_SETTING] environment design. Include: establishing wide shot showing full environment, key architectural and technological elements, lighting that supports mood and narrative, human scale reference, atmospheric effects (fog, particles, volumetric light). Design language: cohesive visual style mixing [INFLUENCES]. Color palette supporting emotional tone. Suitable for: film preproduction, game development, or illustration portfolio. Include subtle storytelling elements suggesting history and culture of the space.

prompts.title: AWS Serverless Architecture Pattern
prompts.prompt_text: Design a serverless architecture on AWS for [APPLICATION_TYPE] handling [SCALE]. Include: 1) API Gateway + Lambda configuration, 2) DynamoDB schema design with GSIs, 3) Event-driven processing with EventBridge/SQS, 4) Authentication with Cognito, 5) File processing with S3 triggers, 6) Step Functions for complex workflows, 7) Monitoring with CloudWatch and X-Ray, 8) Cost optimization strategies. Provide SAM/CDK templates, IAM policies, and load testing approach.

prompts.title: Interactive Data Visualization Dashboard
prompts.prompt_text: Design an interactive data visualization dashboard for [DATA_TYPE] using [D3.js/Recharts/ECharts]. Include: 1) Dashboard layout with responsive grid, 2) Chart type selection for each metric (appropriate visualization), 3) Filter and drill-down functionality, 4) Real-time data updates, 5) Export and sharing features, 6) Accessibility compliance, 7) Performance optimization for large datasets, 8) Mobile-responsive design. Provide React/Vue component architecture and animation specifications.

prompts.title: Podcast Guest Outreach System
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive podcast guest outreach system for [PODCAST_NICHE]. Include: 1) Ideal guest persona definition, 2) Research and prospecting methodology, 3) Outreach email templates (cold, warm, referral), 4) Follow-up sequence, 5) Booking and scheduling workflow, 6) Pre-interview briefing template, 7) Guest preparation guide to send, 8) Post-episode promotion collaboration framework. Include tracking spreadsheet template and response rate optimization tips.

prompts.title: Dark Academia Aesthetic Scene
prompts.prompt_text: Create a dark academia aesthetic scene featuring [SETTING: library/study/lecture hall]. Include: rich mahogany wood paneling, leather-bound books, vintage globes and brass instruments, candlelight or desk lamp creating warm pools of light in overall dim atmosphere, classical artwork or busts, ivy visible through Gothic windows. Style: moody and intellectual, romanticized scholarly life. Color palette: deep browns, forest greens, burgundy, gold accents. Time: late evening. Include subtle details suggesting academic pursuit: open books, handwritten notes, coffee cup.

prompts.title: Technical Blog Post Template System
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive technical blog post system for [TECH_COMPANY/PRODUCT]. Include: 1) Tutorial post template (step-by-step, code samples, screenshots), 2) Thought leadership template (trends, opinions, predictions), 3) Case study template (problem, solution, results), 4) Comparison post template (fair, comprehensive, actionable), 5) Release notes/changelog template, 6) SEO optimization checklist per template, 7) Code snippet formatting standards, 8) Review and publication workflow. Include example outlines for each template type.

prompts.title: Food Photography Styling Setup
prompts.prompt_text: Create a professional food photography shot of [DISH_TYPE] in [STYLE: rustic/modern/editorial]. Styling: hero dish with supporting props (ingredients, utensils, linens) creating visual story. Lighting: natural window light (or simulated) with subtle fill. Angle: [overhead/45-degree/eye-level] as appropriate for dish. Background: complementary surface (marble/wood/ceramic). Composition: rule of thirds with intentional negative space. Include steam, garnish, and texture details. Color palette: appetizing and harmonious. Style reference: [PUBLICATION/PHOTOGRAPHER].

prompts.title: PostgreSQL Performance Optimization
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive PostgreSQL performance optimization guide for [DATABASE_SIZE] database with [QUERY_PATTERNS]. Include: 1) Query analysis using EXPLAIN ANALYZE, 2) Index strategy (B-tree, GIN, GiST, BRIN), 3) Partitioning approach for large tables, 4) Connection pooling with PgBouncer, 5) Vacuum and maintenance scheduling, 6) Memory and configuration tuning, 7) Monitoring queries and alerts, 8) Common anti-patterns to avoid. Provide example queries, configuration snippets, and performance testing methodology.

prompts.title: Employee Advocacy Program Design
prompts.prompt_text: Design a comprehensive employee advocacy program for [COMPANY_SIZE] company. Include: 1) Program objectives and KPIs, 2) Participant recruitment and onboarding, 3) Content library and sharing guidelines, 4) Training on personal branding, 5) Gamification and incentive structure, 6) Compliance and brand safety guardrails, 7) Technology platform recommendations, 8) Measurement and reporting framework. Provide launch plan, communication templates, and ongoing engagement strategies.

prompts.title: Minimalist Japanese Interior Design
prompts.prompt_text: Create a minimalist Japanese-inspired interior of [ROOM_TYPE]. Include: natural materials (light wood, stone, paper), tatami or woven floor elements, shoji screens filtering soft light, single statement piece (ikebana, ceramic, art), intentional empty space (ma concept), neutral earth tone palette with single accent color, indoor plant or zen garden view, clean lines and perfect proportions. Lighting: soft and diffused, creating calm atmosphere. Style: contemporary interpretation of traditional Japanese aesthetics, suitable for luxury real estate or design publication.

prompts.title: Redis Caching Strategy Implementation
prompts.prompt_text: Design a comprehensive Redis caching strategy for [APPLICATION_TYPE]. Include: 1) Cache-aside pattern implementation, 2) Key naming conventions and namespacing, 3) TTL strategies by data type, 4) Cache invalidation approaches, 5) Cache warming and preloading, 6) Cluster configuration for high availability, 7) Memory management and eviction policies, 8) Monitoring and alerting setup. Provide code implementations in [LANGUAGE], configuration examples, and troubleshooting runbook.

prompts.title: LinkedIn Thought Leadership Content
prompts.prompt_text: Create a month of LinkedIn thought leadership content for [EXECUTIVE_ROLE] in [INDUSTRY]. Include: 1) 4 long-form articles (1500+ words) on industry trends, 2) 12 short-form posts with hooks and insights, 3) 4 carousel post concepts with slide breakdowns, 4) 4 poll topics to drive engagement, 5) Comment response templates for common scenarios, 6) Connection request message templates, 7) Content repurposing suggestions, 8) Posting schedule and best times. Each piece should establish expertise while remaining authentic and engaging.

prompts.title: Cyberpunk Neon City Street
prompts.prompt_text: Create a cyberpunk city street scene at night in rain. Include: towering buildings with holographic advertisements, neon signs in multiple languages (Japanese, English, Korean), wet pavement reflecting colorful lights, steam rising from street vents, diverse crowd with cybernetic enhancements, flying vehicles in background, street vendors and shop fronts. Atmosphere: dense, layered, lived-in. Color palette: deep blues, magentas, cyans, with warm accent lighting. Style: Blade Runner meets Tokyo meets Hong Kong. Mood: melancholic beauty in urban density.

prompts.title: API Testing Strategy Complete
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive API testing strategy for [API_TYPE]. Include: 1) Unit testing controllers and services, 2) Integration testing with test databases, 3) Contract testing with Pact or similar, 4) End-to-end testing of critical flows, 5) Performance testing with load scenarios, 6) Security testing (authentication, injection, OWASP), 7) CI/CD integration and test gates, 8) Test data management and fixtures. Provide test code templates, mock strategies, and coverage requirements.

prompts.title: Webinar Funnel Conversion System
prompts.prompt_text: Design a high-converting webinar funnel for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include: 1) Registration page copy and design brief, 2) Confirmation and reminder email sequence, 3) Webinar presentation structure (90 minutes), 4) Offer presentation and close framework, 5) Replay sequence for non-attendees, 6) Objection handling email sequence, 7) Cart abandonment recovery, 8) Post-webinar nurture for non-buyers. Include copy templates, slide deck outline, and conversion optimization checklist.

prompts.title: Vintage Travel Poster Design
prompts.prompt_text: Create a vintage travel poster for [DESTINATION] in the style of [ERA: 1920s-1960s]. Include: iconic landmark or scenery as focal point, simplified geometric shapes and bold colors, limited color palette (4-6 colors), hand-lettered or period-appropriate typography for destination name, decorative border or frame element, sense of aspiration and wanderlust. Style: Art Deco, Mid-Century Modern, or Golden Age of Travel illustration. Print-ready composition with proper bleed areas. Evoke the romance of travel from the era.

prompts.title: CI/CD Pipeline Architecture Design
prompts.prompt_text: Design a comprehensive CI/CD pipeline for [APPLICATION_TYPE] using [PLATFORM]. Include: 1) Source control branching strategy, 2) Build stage with caching optimization, 3) Test stages (unit, integration, E2E), 4) Security scanning integration, 5) Artifact management and versioning, 6) Environment promotion strategy, 7) Deployment strategies (blue-green, canary), 8) Rollback procedures. Provide pipeline configuration files, environment setup, and operational runbooks.

prompts.title: Sales Objection Handling Framework
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive sales objection handling framework for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include: 1) Top 20 objection categorization (price, timing, competition, authority), 2) Response framework using LAER (Listen, Acknowledge, Explore, Respond), 3) Specific response scripts for each objection, 4) Discovery questions to uncover true objections, 5) Case studies and proof points per objection, 6) When to walk away criteria, 7) Objection prevention strategies, 8) Role-play scenarios for training. Include quick-reference card format.

prompts.title: Magical Realism Portrait
prompts.prompt_text: Create a magical realism portrait where [SUBJECT] is surrounded by or integrated with [MAGICAL_ELEMENT: butterflies/flowers/light/water]. The supernatural elements should feel organic and dreamlike, emerging naturally from or around the subject. Lighting: soft and ethereal, suggesting otherworldly source. Background: gradual transition from realistic to fantastical. Expression: serene, knowing, connected to the magical elements. Color grading: slightly surreal but cohesive. Style reference: contemporary fairy tale illustration meets fine art portrait photography.

prompts.title: Terraform Multi-Environment Setup
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive Terraform project structure for [CLOUD_PROVIDER] managing multiple environments. Include: 1) Module organization and reusability, 2) Environment separation (dev/staging/prod), 3) State management with remote backends, 4) Variable management and secrets handling, 5) Workspace vs directory structure comparison, 6) CI/CD integration for plan/apply, 7) Drift detection and remediation, 8) Documentation and change management. Provide module templates, pipeline configuration, and operational guidelines.

prompts.title: TikTok Content Strategy Framework
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive TikTok content strategy for [BRAND/CREATOR] in [NICHE]. Include: 1) Content pillar framework (education, entertainment, inspiration), 2) Trending format library with brand applications, 3) Hook strategies for first 1-3 seconds, 4) Hashtag research and strategy, 5) Posting frequency and timing optimization, 6) Sound and music selection approach, 7) Collaboration and duet strategies, 8) Analytics interpretation and iteration process. Provide 30-day content calendar with specific video concepts.

prompts.title: Cozy Autumn Reading Nook
prompts.prompt_text: Create a cozy autumn reading nook scene. Include: window seat with plush cushions and throws in warm earth tones, rain or fall leaves visible through window, stack of books and steaming mug of tea or cocoa, candles casting warm glow, soft knit blankets, perhaps a cat curled up nearby. Lighting: warm and intimate, combination of natural grey daylight and warm artificial light. Color palette: burgundy, burnt orange, cream, forest green. Atmosphere: ultimate comfort and hygge. Style: aspirational lifestyle photography.

prompts.title: Competitive Analysis Framework
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive competitive analysis framework for [COMPANY/PRODUCT] vs [COMPETITOR_TYPE]. Include: 1) Competitor identification and tiering, 2) Feature comparison matrix methodology, 3) Pricing and positioning analysis, 4) Go-to-market strategy comparison, 5) Strengths/weaknesses assessment, 6) Win/loss pattern analysis, 7) Competitive battlecard template, 8) Ongoing monitoring system. Provide analysis templates, battlecard format, and update frequency recommendations.

prompts.title: Docker Container Optimization
prompts.prompt_text: Create a comprehensive Docker container optimization guide for [APPLICATION_TYPE]. Include: 1) Multi-stage build optimization, 2) Layer caching strategies, 3) Base image selection and minimization, 4) Security hardening (non-root user, minimal packages), 5) Health checks and graceful shutdown, 6) Resource limits and requests, 7) Logging and monitoring configuration, 8) Local development workflow with Docker Compose. Provide optimized Dockerfile examples, size comparison benchmarks, and security scanning integration.

prompts.title: Studio Ghibli Inspired Landscape
prompts.prompt_text: Create a landscape scene in the style of Studio Ghibli featuring [SCENE_DESCRIPTION]. Include: lush, detailed nature with hand-painted texture, dramatic cloud formations, magical elements subtly integrated, warm and inviting color palette, sense of wonder and possibility. Composition: sweeping vista with interesting foreground elements. Lighting: golden hour or magical ambient light. Include small details that reward close inspection. Atmosphere: nostalgic, peaceful, slightly fantastical. Reference films: Spirited Away, Howl's Moving Castle, My Neighbor Totoro.

prompts.title: Multi-Platform Content Atomization Engine
prompts.prompt_text:
Transform this long-form content into a complete multi-platform content ecosystem:

Original Content: [PASTE CONTENT HERE]
Content Type: [BLOG/VIDEO/PODCAST/WEBINAR]

Generate:

1. LINKEDIN CONTENT (5 pieces)
- Thought leadership post (long-form with hook)
- Carousel concept (10 slides with text)
- Poll with strategic options
- Short insight post
- Article excerpt with commentary

2. TWITTER/X THREAD (3 variations)
- Educational thread (10-15 tweets)
- Story-driven thread (8-10 tweets)
- Controversial take thread (5-7 tweets)
- Include hooks, transitions, CTAs

3. INSTAGRAM CONTENT
- Carousel script (10 slides)
- Reel script (60 seconds)
- Story sequence (7 frames)
- Quote graphics text (5 variations)

4. TIKTOK/SHORTS
- Hook variations (5 different angles)
- Script 1: Educational (45-60s)
- Script 2: Story-driven (30-45s)
- Script 3: Controversial/hot take (15-30s)

5. EMAIL NEWSLETTER
- Subject line options (5)
- Preview text (3 options)
- Full newsletter with sections

6. BLOG DERIVATIVES
- Listicle version
- How-to guide version
- FAQ expansion

7. YOUTUBE
- Full script adaptation
- Shorts scripts (3)
- Community post

Include hashtag strategies, optimal posting times, and engagement hooks for each platform.

prompts.title: Advanced TypeScript Design Patterns
prompts.prompt_text:
Implement advanced TypeScript design patterns for [USE CASE].

Application Context: [DESCRIBE APPLICATION]
Key Challenges: [LIST CHALLENGES]

Generate production-ready code for:

1. CREATIONAL PATTERNS
- Abstract Factory with generics
- Builder pattern with fluent API
- Singleton with lazy initialization
- Prototype with deep cloning

2. STRUCTURAL PATTERNS
- Adapter with type transformations
- Decorator with metadata
- Facade for complex subsystems
- Proxy with validation

3. BEHAVIORAL PATTERNS
- Strategy with dependency injection
- Observer with typed events
- Command with undo/redo
- State machine implementation

4. FUNCTIONAL PATTERNS
- Monad implementations (Maybe, Either, IO)
- Lens for immutable updates
- Pipe/Compose utilities
- Currying helpers

5. ADVANCED TYPE UTILITIES
- Branded types for domain modeling
- Template literal types
- Conditional type helpers
- Variance annotations

6. ERROR HANDLING
- Result type implementation
- Custom error hierarchy
- Error boundary patterns

For each pattern provide:
- Full TypeScript implementation
- Type definitions
- Usage examples
- Unit test templates
- When to use / when to avoid

prompts.title: Photorealistic Food Photography
prompts.prompt_text:
Create a stunning photorealistic food photograph:

Dish: [DISH NAME]
Cuisine: [CUISINE TYPE]
Mood: [ELEGANT/RUSTIC/MODERN/COMFORT]

Technical Specifications:

LIGHTING SETUP:
- Key light: [NATURAL WINDOW/SOFTBOX] at [ANGLE]°
- Fill: [REFLECTOR/SECONDARY LIGHT] at [RATIO]
- Backlight: [YES/NO] for [STEAM/GLOW/HIGHLIGHTS]
- Color temperature: [WARM/NEUTRAL/COOL] ([KELVIN]K)

COMPOSITION:
- Angle: [OVERHEAD/45°/STRAIGHT-ON/LOW]
- Rule: [THIRDS/GOLDEN RATIO/CENTER/DIAGONAL]
- Depth: [SHALLOW DOF/DEEP FOCUS] f/[APERTURE]
- Focal length: [LENS]mm equivalent

STYLING:
- Hero plate: [SHAPE/COLOR/SIZE]
- Props: [LIST PROPS]
- Surface: [MATERIAL/TEXTURE/COLOR]
- Linens: [NAPKIN/TABLECLOTH DETAILS]

prompts.title: Feature Flag Management System
prompts.prompt_text:
Build a feature flag management system for [APPLICATION].

Scale: [USER COUNT]
Deployment: [FREQUENCY]
Team Size: [DEVELOPERS]
Complexity: [SIMPLE/ADVANCED]

System Design:

1. FLAG TYPES

Release Flags:
- Purpose: Deployment control
- Lifecycle: Short-term
- Example: `enable_new_checkout`

Experiment Flags:
- Purpose: A/B testing
- Lifecycle: Medium-term
- Example: `checkout_variant`

Ops Flags:
- Purpose: Operational control
- Lifecycle: Permanent
- Example: `enable_maintenance_mode`

Permission Flags:
- Purpose: Feature access
- Lifecycle: Long-term
- Example: `enable_premium_features`

2. TARGETING RULES

```typescript
interface TargetingRule {
  conditions: Condition[];
  percentage: number;
  variant: string;
}

interface Condition {
  attribute: string;
  operator: Operator;
  value: any;
}
```

Supported Operators:
- equals, notEquals
- contains, notContains
- greaterThan, lessThan
- in, notIn
- matches (regex)

3. SDK IMPLEMENTATION

```typescript
class FeatureFlags {
  isEnabled(flag: string, context: Context): boolean
  getVariant(flag: string, context: Context): string
  getAllFlags(context: Context): Record<string, boolean>
}
```

4. EVALUATION ENGINE
- Rule priority
- Percentage rollout (consistent hashing)
- Default values
- Caching strategy

5. ADMIN INTERFACE
- Flag CRUD operations
- Targeting rule builder
- Audit logging
- Environment management

6. ANALYTICS INTEGRATION
- Flag exposure tracking
- Experiment analysis
- Impact measurement

7. OPERATIONS
- Kill switch functionality
- Gradual rollout
- Rollback procedures
- Stale flag detection

Include complete code implementation.

prompts.title: Message Queue Architecture
prompts.prompt_text:
Design a message queue architecture for [USE CASE].

Scale: [MESSAGES/SECOND]
Latency: [REQUIREMENTS]
Delivery: [AT-LEAST-ONCE/EXACTLY-ONCE]
Ordering: [REQUIRED/NOT REQUIRED]

Architecture Design:

1. QUEUE SELECTION

Option Analysis:
- RabbitMQ: [PROS/CONS]
- Kafka: [PROS/CONS]
- SQS/SNS: [PROS/CONS]
- Redis Streams: [PROS/CONS]

Recommendation: [CHOICE] because [REASONS]

2. TOPOLOGY DESIGN

Exchange/Topic Structure:
- [EXCHANGE 1]: Purpose, routing
- [EXCHANGE 2]: Purpose, routing

Queue Configuration:
- [QUEUE 1]: Bindings, settings
- [QUEUE 2]: Bindings, settings

3. MESSAGE DESIGN

```typescript
interface Message<T> {
  id: string;
  type: string;
  version: string;
  timestamp: Date;
  correlationId: string;
  payload: T;
  metadata: Record<string, any>;
}
```

4. PRODUCER IMPLEMENTATION
```typescript
class MessageProducer {
  async publish<T>(message: Message<T>): Promise<void>
  async publishBatch<T>(messages: Message<T>[]): Promise<void>
}
```

5. CONSUMER IMPLEMENTATION
```typescript
class MessageConsumer {
  async consume(handler: MessageHandler): Promise<void>
  async acknowledge(message: Message): Promise<void>
  async reject(message: Message, requeue: boolean): Promise<void>
}
```

6. ERROR HANDLING
- Retry strategies
- Dead letter queues
- Poison message handling
- Circuit breakers

7. MONITORING
- Queue depth
- Consumer lag
- Processing latency
- Error rates

8. OPERATIONS
- Scaling strategy
- Maintenance procedures
- Disaster recovery

Include complete implementation code.

Client Implementation:
```typescript
class OAuthClient {
  generateAuthUrl(state: string): string
  generateCodeVerifier(): string
  generateCodeChallenge(verifier: string): string
  exchangeCode(code: string, verifier: string): Promise<TokenSet>
  refreshToken(refreshToken: string): Promise<TokenSet>
}
```

Server Implementation:
```typescript
class AuthorizationServer {
  authorize(request: AuthRequest): AuthResponse
  token(request: TokenRequest): TokenResponse
  introspect(token: string): TokenInfo
  revoke(token: string): void
}
```

2. TOKEN MANAGEMENT

```typescript
interface TokenSet {
  accessToken: string;
  refreshToken?: string;
  expiresIn: number;
  tokenType: 'Bearer';
  scope: string;
}
```

- Secure storage strategy

class ClientCredentials {
  async getToken(scope: string): Promise<TokenSet>
}

prompts.title: Rate Limiting System Design
prompts.prompt_text:
Design and implement a rate limiting system for [APPLICATION].

Scale: [REQUESTS/SECOND]
Distributed: [YES/NO]
Algorithm: [TOKEN BUCKET/SLIDING WINDOW/FIXED WINDOW]
Granularity: [USER/IP/API KEY/ENDPOINT]

Implementation:

1. ALGORITHM IMPLEMENTATIONS

Token Bucket:
```typescript
class TokenBucket {
  constructor(capacity: number, refillRate: number)
  tryConsume(tokens: number): boolean
  getTokens(): number
}
```

Sliding Window Log:
```typescript
class SlidingWindowLog {
  constructor(windowSize: number, limit: number)
  isAllowed(identifier: string): boolean
  getCount(identifier: string): number
}
```

Sliding Window Counter:
```typescript
class SlidingWindowCounter {
  constructor(windowSize: number, limit: number)
  isAllowed(identifier: string): boolean
}
```

2. DISTRIBUTED RATE LIMITING

Redis Implementation:
```typescript
class DistributedRateLimiter {
  async isAllowed(key: string, limit: number, window: number): Promise<RateLimitResult>
  async getRemainingQuota(key: string): Promise<number>
}
```

3. MIDDLEWARE INTEGRATION
```typescript
function rateLimitMiddleware(config: RateLimitConfig): Middleware {
  return async (req, res, next) => {
    // Implementation
  }
}
```

4. CONFIGURATION
```typescript
interface RateLimitConfig {
  limits: RateLimit[];
  keyGenerator: KeyGenerator;
  onRateLimited: RateLimitHandler;
  headers: boolean;
}
```

5. RESPONSE HEADERS
- X-RateLimit-Limit
- X-RateLimit-Remaining
- X-RateLimit-Reset
- Retry-After

6. TIERED LIMITS
- Anonymous users
- Authenticated users
- Premium users
- Enterprise

7. BYPASS & OVERRIDE
- Whitelist management
- Emergency bypass
- Temporary increases

8. MONITORING
- Rate limit hits
- Near-limit warnings
- Abuse detection
- Dashboards

9. TESTING
- Unit tests
- Load tests
- Edge cases

Include complete implementation.

prompts.title: Caching Strategy Implementation
prompts.prompt_text:
Design a comprehensive caching strategy for [APPLICATION].

Application Type: [WEB/API/MOBILE BACKEND]
Traffic: [REQUESTS/SECOND]
Data Patterns: [READ-HEAVY/WRITE-HEAVY/MIXED]
Cache Backend: [REDIS/MEMCACHED/CDN]

Caching Architecture:

1. CACHE LAYERS

Browser Cache:
- Cache-Control headers
- ETag implementation
- Service Worker caching

CDN Cache:
- Edge caching rules
- Cache key design
- Purge strategy

Application Cache:
- In-memory cache
- Distributed cache
- Cache hierarchy

Database Cache:
- Query cache
- Result cache
- Connection pooling

2. CACHING PATTERNS

Cache-Aside:
```typescript
async function getData(key: string): Promise<Data> {
  let data = await cache.get(key);
  if (!data) {
    data = await db.query(key);
    await cache.set(key, data, ttl);
  }
  return data;
}
```

Write-Through:
```typescript
async function saveData(key: string, data: Data): Promise<void> {
  await db.save(key, data);
  await cache.set(key, data, ttl);
}
```

Write-Behind:
```typescript
// Implementation with queue
```

Refresh-Ahead:
```typescript
// Implementation with background refresh
```

3. CACHE KEY DESIGN
- Naming conventions
- Versioning
- Namespacing
- Collision prevention

4. INVALIDATION
- TTL strategy
- Event-based invalidation
- Tag-based invalidation
- Cache stampede prevention

5. SERIALIZATION
- Format selection
- Compression
- Versioning

6. MONITORING
- Hit/miss ratio
- Latency metrics
- Memory usage
- Eviction rate

7. FAILURE HANDLING
- Cache failures
- Fallback strategy
- Circuit breaker

Include complete implementation.

1. EVENT DESIGN
```typescript
interface DomainEvent {
  eventId: string;
  aggregateId: string;
  aggregateType: string;
  eventType: string;
  version: number;
  timestamp: Date;
  payload: any;
  metadata: EventMetadata;
}
```

2. AGGREGATE DESIGN
```typescript
abstract class Aggregate {
  private changes: DomainEvent[] = [];
  
  abstract apply(event: DomainEvent): void;
  
  loadFromHistory(events: DomainEvent[]): void
  getUncommittedChanges(): DomainEvent[]
  protected raiseEvent(event: DomainEvent): void
}
```

3. EVENT STORE
```typescript
interface EventStore {
  append(events: DomainEvent[]): Promise<void>
  getEvents(aggregateId: string, fromVersion?: number): Promise<DomainEvent[]>
  getAllEvents(fromPosition?: number): Promise<DomainEvent[]>
}
```

4. PROJECTIONS
- Read model design
- Projection handlers
- Rebuild capability
- Catchup subscriptions

5. SNAPSHOTTING
- Snapshot strategy
- Snapshot storage
- Snapshot restoration

6. COMMAND HANDLING

- Concurrency control
- Idempotency

7. EVENT PUBLISHING

prompts.title: Distributed Locking System
prompts.prompt_text:
Implement a distributed locking system for [APPLICATION].

Scale: [NODES]
Lock Duration: [TYPICAL DURATION]
Backend: [REDIS/ZOOKEEPER/ETCD]
Contention Level: [LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH]

Locking System:

1. LOCK INTERFACE
```typescript
interface DistributedLock {
  acquire(resource: string, ttl: number): Promise<LockHandle>
  release(handle: LockHandle): Promise<void>
  extend(handle: LockHandle, ttl: number): Promise<void>
  isLocked(resource: string): Promise<boolean>
}

interface LockHandle {
  resource: string;
  token: string;
  expiresAt: Date;
}
```

2. ALGORITHMS

Redis Redlock:
- Multi-instance setup
- Quorum-based locking
- Clock drift handling
- Failure scenarios

Zookeeper:
- Sequential nodes
- Watch mechanism
- Session management

3. IMPLEMENTATION
```typescript
class RedisDistributedLock implements DistributedLock {
  async acquire(resource: string, ttl: number): Promise<LockHandle>
  async release(handle: LockHandle): Promise<void>
  async extend(handle: LockHandle, ttl: number): Promise<void>
}
```

4. FEATURES
- Auto-renewal
- Deadlock detection
- Lock queue
- Fairness options

5. ERROR HANDLING
- Lock acquisition failure
- Network partitions
- Node failures
- Recovery procedures

6. MONITORING
- Lock contention
- Wait times
- Deadlock alerts
- Lock holder tracking

7. TESTING
- Concurrency tests
- Failure injection
- Performance tests

Include complete implementation.
